headline: Did Entergy’s (ETR) Nuclear Fuel Tech Bet and Dividend Move Just Recast Its Investment Narrative?
summary: In late January 2026, Entergy’s board declared a US$0.64 per-share quarterly dividend, payable on March 2, 2026, to shareholders of record on February 9, while the company scheduled its Q4 2025 earnings release for pre-market on February 12, 2026. Entergy also entered a Memorandum of Understanding with General Atomics Electromagnetic Systems to explore silicon carbide nuclear fuel cladding, highlighting an effort to improve nuclear fleet safety, performance, and economic efficiency. We’ll...

headline: Entergy's Q4 Earnings In Line With Estimates, Revenues Rise Y/Y
summary: ETR's Q4 EPS matches estimates but falls 22.7% year over year, even as revenues climb 8% and 2026 earnings guidance comes in above consensus.

headline: Entergy (ETR) Q4 Earnings Meet Estimates
summary: Entergy (ETR) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of +0.65% and +1.88%, respectively, for the quarter ended December 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

headline: Entergy Corp (NYSE:ETR) Q4 2025 Earnings Miss Estimates, Stock Dips on Guidance Focus
summary: Entergy (ETR) Q4 earnings missed analyst estimates, triggering a pre-market stock dip. The utility issued 2026 guidance, shifting investor focus to future growth prospects.

raw.headline: Entergy Corp (NYSE:ETR) Q4 2025 Earnings Miss Estimates, Stock Dips on Guidance Focus

headline: Entergy: Q4 Earnings Snapshot
summary: The average estimate of six analysts surveyed by Zacks Investment Research was also for earnings of 51 cents per share. The power company posted revenue of $2.96 billion in the period, surpassing Street forecasts. Five analysts surveyed by Zacks expected $2.9 billion.

raw.headline: Entergy: Q4 Earnings Snapshot
raw.summary: The average estimate of six analysts surveyed by Zacks Investment Research was also for earnings of 51 cents per share. The power company posted revenue of $2.96 billion in the period, surpassing Street forecasts. Five analysts surveyed by Zacks expected $2.9 billion.

headline: Entergy reports 2025 financial results, initiates 2026 guidance
summary: Entergy Corporation (NYSE: ETR) reported fourth quarter 2025 earnings per share of 51 cents on an as-reported and an adjusted (non-GAAP) basis. For the full year, the company reported 2025 earnings per share of $3.91 on an as-reported and an adjusted basis.
